title: Livestream Support PA - Part Time, Sports - Sports Media
text: Sports Digital MediaÂ’s production assistants are responsible for providing digital video live streaming support and monitoring feeds of live Sports networks events.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
